desc: Plan your trip in Southern Africa with Tours Africa. Book tours, transport & accommodation. Providing accredited safari tours, diving tours, shark cage diving, abseiling & many more adventures. Stay up to date with our country, events and highlights on our up-to-date blog. Your adventure in South Africa begins here.

layout.text: THE BEST ADVENTURE, SAFARI, DIVE, AIR, WATER, OVERLAND & DAY TOURS THROUGHOUT AFRICA
